articles.description: Follow live commentary & text updates as Wolves host Liverpool plus six more fixtures from across the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Wolves v Liverpool build-up - plus six more fixtures

articles.description: St Johnstone and Rangers resume their Scottish Premiership campaigns at lunchtime before the 10 other top-flight teams return to action.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Bottom side St Johnstone host stuttering Rangers

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from third practice at the Singapore Grand Prix.
articles.title: Singapore Grand Prix third practice - radio & text

articles.description: Watch live BBC coverage of Tadcaster Albion v Chester and listen to BBC radio commentary from six other fixtures in the FA Cup second qualifying round.
articles.title: Watch: FA Cup second qualifying round - Tadcaster Albion v Chester

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC local radio commentary from Leicestershire against Hampshire in the 2023 One-Day Cup final.
articles.title: One-Day Cup final: Leics v Hants - radio & text

articles.description: There is a late summer holiday feel to Nice but Wales will be determined to avoid becoming a World Cup upset statistic against Portugal.
articles.title: Wales refuse to be Nice guys for Portugal clash

articles.description: Watch highlights as Dawid Malan makes 127 and England beat New Zealand by 100 runs in the fourth one-day international at Lords to claim a 3-1 series victory.
articles.title: Malan century gives England series win over NZ

articles.description: Rory McIlroy battled through a chaotic last-hole to finish on the projected cut mark of one under par at the BMW PGA Championship.
articles.title: McIlroy set to make cut amid chaotic scenes at Wentworth

articles.description: Ireland's Conor Murray hails the ability of his former Munster team-mate Malakai Fekitoa going in to Saturday's World Cup game against Tonga.
articles.title: Irish wary of 'ridiculous athlete' Fekitoa - Murray

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag says he does not know if Jadon Sancho will play for the club again.
articles.title: Ten Hag unsure if Sancho will play for Man Utd again
